Posts.Content: Jul 20, 2010 10:46PM mct377 wrote: I know what you mean about lala land. I have been waiting for treatment since June 22nd. All I have been doing is having MRI and Ultra sounds Test after test bad news is all I except. Some days are great because There normal no tests no doctors. But now I have an appointment to start treatment (Chemo) and now I am scared so many questions come to mind. I feel for you but all we have to do is think positive and think that Cancer can not bet us we must bet it.
Posts.Title: Waiting for treatment, feel like I am waiting for the ax to fall gutsy AmyIsStrong
